(?:(?P<speaker_skq>[A-Za-z]+) (?P<keyword_skq>asserted|insisted|aserted|calling|quipped|called|quiped|saying|asked|spoke|quip|said|say) (?P<qchar_skq>"|'|(?P<ldquo_skq>“))(?P<quote_skq>[^
	]{3,1000}?),?(?(ldquo_skq)(?:”)|(?P=qchar_skq))|(?P<qchar_qsk>"|'|(?P<ldquo_qsk>“))(?P<quote_qsk>[^
	]{3,1000}?),?(?(ldquo_qsk)(?:”)|(?P=qchar_qsk)),? (?P<speaker_qsk>[A-Za-z]+) (?P<keyword_qsk>asserted|insisted|aserted|calling|quipped|called|quiped|saying|asked|spoke|quip|said|say))
